entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
